a0s a1s b0s b1s
a0e a1e b0e b1e
t u v
ms

a01 = a0e - a0s
a02 = a01 * t
a0 = a02 + a0s
a11 = a1e - a1s
a12 = a11 * t
a1 = a12 + a1s
b01 = b0e - b0s
b02 = b01 * t
b0 = b02 + b0s
b11 = b1e - b1s
b12 = b11 * t
b1 = b12 + b1s
edge01 = b1 - b0
edge02 = edge01 * v
edge0 = edge02 + b0
edge11 = a1 - a0
edge12 = edge11 * u
edge1 = edge12 + a0
F = edge1 - edge0
C = F - ms
